thread.section_title: FCW: The business of federal technology
thread.title: The shifting IT shopping lists

title: The shifting IT shopping lists
text:
The shifting IT shopping lists By FCW Staff Sep 28, 2015 
FCW’s parent company polled 704 buyers of government IT and found surprising trends in the solutions being sought. 
Source: 1105 Public Sector Media Group’s 13th Annual Government Technology Buying Study. To learn more about the report, contact Dana Friedman: 703.876.5078 About the Author 
Connect with the FCW staff on Twitter @FCWnow . <>
